channel.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internel or external command, HELP PLEASE
channel.description:
when i run cloudclient that i downloaded, i get this -
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img250.imageshack.us/img250/1537/uh234819wp7.png[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-19
Whats wrong?! please help!
and when i use compiler, it says ' i need JDK 5 or 6." when ive already downloaded it!!!!
PLEASE HELP!
